description: Now that Chiffon is able to talk, she tells of four special Pickruns. These give the girls the ability to become Pretty Cure and grant them powers. Three of them, the Pirun, the Blun, and the Kirun, are found. All that remains is the Akarun, a red Pickrun...

titles.title: 4 Ninme no Precure!? Akarun o Sagase!!
4人目のプリキュア!? アカルンを探せ!!
The Fourth Pretty Cure!? Search for Akarun!!
